title: Emma's Bliss (2006)
description:
After getting the bad news that he is soon to die of cancer, Max wants to escape to the most beautiful place in the world Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Mexico. When he accidentally lands at EmmaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s pig farm, he realizes that true happiness waits just around the corner... Emma is a pig-breeder at a shabby and indebted farm. She slaughters the pigs in her own way: she treats them lovingly till the last day; the lethal cut shows something like tenderness and in EmmaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s strong arms the dying animals cease bleeding, calmly and submittingly. But Emma is lonely. The missing man in her life is replaced by her motor-bike. But the loneliness stays. Until one night when a Jaguar crashes on her farm. Inside the wrecked car lies an unconscious man and a bag full of money. EmmaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s luck seems to be perfect: fate has thrown money Ã¢â‚¬â€œ and a man, Max Ã¢â‚¬â€œ into her lap. Suspecting that he has stolen the money, Emma hides the man in her bed and the money under her bed. But soon Hans, MaxÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s best friend and employer, turns up and wants his money back. In an attempt to reconciliate, Hans brings Max to a nearby hospital. Emma overcomes her shyness and finally brings him back home to the farm. Their last days together are sweetened by happiness, but MaxÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s days are numbered. Finally, he takes an example from the pigs and surrenders to EmmaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s tender nature.
